SCRIPT.MSCRI:
!---------------------Logging Connection Details------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Host name : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Host name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WRM_HOST#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Port : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Port" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WRM_PORT#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Username : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Username" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WRM_USERNAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Use SSL : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Use SSL" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WRM_SSL#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Skip CA Check : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Skip CA Check" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WRM_CA_CHECK#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Skip CN Check : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Skip CN Check" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WRM_CN_CHECK#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Connection Timeout(second) : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Connection Timeout(second)" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_WRM_CONN_TIMEOUT#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM

DOCU_Docu.DOC: Common AE script to log Connection details parameters.
